head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MCELROY, JAMES J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MCELROY, JAMES J.

block.p: McELROY-James J. On July 19, 2000. Beloved husband of Lillian. Loving father of Patricia, Jeanne, James, Kathleen, Michael, Teresa, and Maria. Cherished grandfather of nine grandchildren. Also survived by many nieces and nephews. Friends may call at the Thomas F. Dalton Funeral Home, 29 Atlantic Avenue, Floral Park (at RR Plaza) Thursday and Friday 25 and 7-9:30 p.m. Funeral Mass Saturday 9:30 a.m. at Our Lady of Victory Church. Interment St. Charles Cemetery.
